definition: in one's spare time/outside working hours/amateur (historian etc)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
college for people who attend after work

sentences.english: A must for the amateur anthropologist who seeks to guage the feromonic field.
sentences.chinese: 爲業餘人類學家在測量領域尋求軌跡而準備的物品。

sentences.english: Professional athletes were fully embraced, finally ending the tradition of amateurism at the games.
sentences.chinese: 專業運動員被完全接受，終於在比賽結束的業餘傳統。

sentences.english: After all, everyone needs a hobby.
sentences.chinese: 必竟，每個人都需要有一個業餘愛好的。

sentences.english: Have a bright shape, lively & open, auto fans, a member of amateur racing car organization.
sentences.chinese: 形象陽光，活潑開朗，喜愛汽車，參加業餘賽車隊。

sentences.english: And certain high-risk professions and hobbies usually have to be disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 某些高風險職業和業餘愛好通常也必須予以說明澄清。

sentences.english: All chessplayers should have a hobby.
sentences.chinese: 所有棋手都應該有一項業餘愛好。

sentences.english: Lorz was immediately banned for life from any future amateur competition.
sentences.chinese: 洛爾斯隨即被宣判終身不得參加任何業餘比賽。

sentences.english: In addition to study and practice, the amateur life is very small.
sentences.chinese: 除了學習和實踐，小人的業餘生活也非常豐富。

sentences.english: By contrast, unhappy people watched significantly more television in their spare time.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，不幸福的人業餘時間很明顯地多看電視。

sentences.english: In her spare time, Tori likes to travel to learn new things from different parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 在業餘時間，劉芳喜歡到世界各地旅遊感受新事物。

sentences.english: Don't go into your passion with amateur skills.
sentences.chinese: 千萬不要以滿腔的熱情卻表現出業餘的水平。

sentences.english: In which, the teacher of the masses is the major source of staff's amateur educational teachers.
sentences.chinese: 其中，羣衆教師是河南職工業餘教育教師的主要來源。

sentences.english: My hobby is a good safety-valve for the tension that builds up at work.
sentences.chinese: 我用業餘愛好來消除工作中產生的緊張情緒。

sentences.english: Stamp collecting as well as fishing is Mr. Evan's favorite avocation.
sentences.chinese: 集郵以及釣魚都是艾文先生最喜歡的業餘愛好。

sentences.english: Today our topis is how to take full use of your spare time.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們的作者是如何充分利用你的業餘時間。

sentences.english: When she was 8 years old, she won the championship in the national competition of the amateur sports school.
sentences.chinese: 8歲時，獲得業餘體校全國冠軍。
